00100     public: virtual inline bool equals (const VRTObject &o) const {
00101       try {
00102         return equals(*checked_dynamic_cast<const VRTEvent*>(&o));
00103       }
00104       catch (bad_cast &e) {
00105         UNUSED_VARIABLE(e);
00106         return false;
00107       }
00108     }
00109 
00111     public: inline bool isNullValue () const {
00112       return isNull(sourceStr);
00113     }
